Document.p: Universities help to increase your technology level. In the process they consume goods and labor. They produce more than schools for a given goods/labor input. However they consume a lot of goods and labor and also cost quite a lot of money to run, so you should have the economic and industrial capacity to supply them.
You will need a number of universities to achieve a tech level close to 100%
Universities do not need to be connected to transport; they can get all their requirements from markets within range and with enough labor and goods available.
You must have 4 schools per university to supply them with students.
A university can sustain up to ~20 tech <100 or ~10 tech >100
